name: raycast-clipaste
title: Raycast Clipaste Launcher
description: Keyboard-first Raycast extension to run clipaste with a form, recipes, and clipboard preview/history.
author: markomanninen

commands.name: launcher
commands.title: Clipaste Launcher
commands.description: Run clipaste with arguments from a single form.

preferences.name: clipastePath
preferences.label: clipaste binary
preferences.title: clipaste binary
preferences.description: Path to the clipaste executable (or just 'clipaste' if it's on PATH).

preferences.name: defaultOutputDir
preferences.label: Default Output Directory
preferences.title: Default Output Directory
preferences.description: Used when 'Paste' has empty Output dir.

preferences.name: enablePngpaste
preferences.label: Enable pngpaste fallback (macOS)
preferences.title: Enable pngpaste fallback (macOS)
preferences.description: If clipboard contains an image (not a file), try to dump it via pngpaste for preview.

preferences.name: pngpastePath
preferences.label: pngpaste binary
preferences.title: pngpaste binary
preferences.description: Path to pngpaste (e.g., 'pngpaste'). Install with: brew install pngpaste
